views.markdown:
Change things that affect the iOS SpringBoard


Main Features


• set custom radius for Appswitcher Cards.


• remove Torch or Camera Button in LS.


• disable TodayView in LS


• Remove EU vol Limit.


• disable display wake if Music is playing and you press vol up/down


• disable display wake if Message received.


• disable backlightdim when press lock Button.


• disable icon fly-in if device is unlocked.


• disable clock Animation on SpringBoard.


• disable idle Timer in LS completly (device won't go to black screen) or set custom timers in ms. (Only iOS 15.)
- Initial Release on BigBoss for iOS 13 and up
